    3 minute read

    Published: April 03, 2020

    April 4, 2020

    • I have spent the day trying to implement the best response to maxirl. I have created an experiment journal, I think I will feel that kind of day more useful with that, it trains me how to communicate about my experiment, it forces me to understand what I do and I will be more productive not trying the same thing twice.
    • I have continued to watch Abbeelâ€™s lecture. I really think that this format is good (30min) but I should be sure that I donâ€™t spend long time to write the post. Ideally, 20 minutes of watching and 10 minutes of writing.
    • SD: The interviewed businessman talked about reading every day a paper where he wrote his goals. I have created the post goals because of that, I think itâ€™s always good to understand his small daily actions as part of a long-term goal. He also gave a concrete technique: if we are not in the powerful state, breath 6 times and AIA: awareness (what iâ€™m thinking), intention (what I want to do), action (small action to handle it).
    • Gonna shut down computers at 10 and take melatonin, letâ€™s not put any alarm and write down what time I wake up. Tomorrow letâ€™s try to not take melatonin anymore.

      Tomorrow, letâ€™s continue the experiment on MACIRL and send to Dylan and Simon (this time for real!) and think about the theory: can we prove a gibbard version for sequential decision-making and observations? I should read different versions of the proof of Gibbard. Maybe start with a multi-armed bandit setting. Then, I want to think about my coordination IL project, write a post about it and read Abbeelâ€™s article. Then, continue the tutorial on openai, implement PPO and make it work for my multi agent environment. Start to think about a post about multiagent systems and the emergence of behaviors.
